amendment.description: Amendment provides for an additional $10 million for the Defense Health Program account for the purpose of finding a cure for Gulf War illness, which is offset by a reduction in the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account of a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase the Defense Health Program Account by $10 million to specifically target finding a cure for Gulf War Illness.
